alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 18 at 6:20PM AKST until November 19 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Anchorage. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of fog have formed in the Anchorage Bowl as of early Saturday evening. Fog will become more widespread in the Anchorage area through the evening hours, then persist through at least Sunday morning. The sun should help burn off some of the fog on Sunday, though localized areas of fog could linger.
info.instruction: A dense fog advisory means visibilities will frequently be reduced to less than one quarter mile. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
